reviews.review:
One of the greatest stories in a game I have ever played.  I wouldn't say that there's a ton of replayability but playing it through one time is an amazing experience.

Pros

-Amazing story
-Puzzles are incredibly fun
-You'll laugh, you'll cry, and want to do it all over again

Cons

-Not a lot of replayability
-Finishing the game will leave you feeling like someone cut out a part of your soul. (like finishing a television series)
Gra z jedną z najlepszych fabuł jakie spotkałem. Polecam w 200%
Это просто супер!!!
Výborná hra :) Doufám že bude další díl, nebo alespon nějaké DLC.

整个剧情是通宵玩过去的，游戏一开始就被吸引住了
剧情轻松明快，画面整洁清爽，难度适中，配音以及音乐都非常优秀。
GLADOS死傲娇，作为男的玩如此有百合感的游戏有一种莫名的感觉。
最后一关机器人大合奏还有扔出来爱心方块（GLADOS死傲娇）加上那首want you gone非常让人感动。
Wheatley也非常呆萌。还有那个“出故障的”太空核心也是非常萌（SPAAAAAAAAAAAACE）
单机剧情结束后还可以玩制作工坊的地图，地图编辑系统非常不错。加上有双人合作模式，游戏的可玩性是非常高的。
绝对是非常优秀的游戏
NICE game
Výborná hra odporůčam
Le meilleur jeu que je connaisse :) il est surtout celui qui m'a occupé le plus :)
Крутяк крутятский афигенский портальский ху*ня.

En mi humilde opinión Portal 2 es una joya de los juegos de resolución de puzles. No sólo la mejora gráfica respecto a la primera entrega es reseñable, sino que la adición de nuevos componentes a los puzzles, la reaparición estelar (y más sarcástica que nunca) de GLaDOS, así como la exploración de las instalaciones originales de Aperture Science hacen de esta segunda entrega un juego obligatorio para tu biblioteca de Steam. 

[b][u]Lo positivo[/u][/b]

-Gráficos magníficos que te sumergen de lleno en Aperture Science.
-Humor, sarcasmo e ironía que amenizan nuestra experiencia (made in GLaDOS)
-La adición de nuevos componentes en los puzles.
-Manejo más que fácil; podrás jugar con apenas cuatro teclas.
-Modo multijugador para infinitas horas de diversión con tus amigos.
-Creador de salas de pruebas con el que podrás no solo crear, sino probar las de la comunidad.

[b][u]Lo negativo[/u][/b]

-No es un juego demasiado largo, el cuerpo pide más.
-El creador se limita a cámaras de un único tipo.

En definitiva, si bien no es un juego de gran duración (sobre todo si eres de los que juegan horas y horas sin parar), Portal 2 es ineludible. El humor socarrón de GLaDOS nos acompañará en una aventura divertida, interesante y muy original. ¡100% recomendable!
great game..hours of fun.

Jakmile se do něčeho pustí Valve, tak to vždycky stojí za to. Možná proto, že neprodukují hry jako na běžícím pásu.

Singleplayer je skvělý počin, pokud chcete při hře myslet. Pokud ne, tak se ani nemusíte obtěžovat, protože daleko nedojdete. Promyšlený příběh je doplněný o skvělé dialogy a eastereggy, takže se u hry i dost pobavíte.

Komu nebude přinejmenším smutno na závěr hry, tak by si to měl zahrát ještě jednou a dávat tentokrát pozor.

Multiplayer pro 2 lidi je skvělý nápad, při němž se skrze testovací roboty musíte vzájemně doplňovat a procházet spolu složité rébusy. Nejvhodnější kombinace lidí na hraní je blbý a ještě blbější. Jinak to chytrý otráví tomu pomalejšímu (ano, to jsem byl já), protože za něj vymyslí co má dělat, ještě než se stihne rozkoukat.

[h1]The best solution to a problem is usually the easiest one. And I'll be honest - killing you is hard... [/h1]
2인 플레이 지렸당

Сами тесты очень интересны и логически обдумываешь как пройти тот или иной уровень. Порталами можно пользоваться для своего интереса, но в ограниченных зонах. Рекомендую эту игру, тем более сейчас по такой скидке.

this game impresses me evry time i play.

This game has impressed me much more than portal 1 did, and I loved that game.
Single Player:
- Still a great storyline 
- Lots of humour
- New things to learn (Gel, light tunnels, light bridges etc.)
- Puzzles are quite challenging 

And there is MULTIPLAYER :D. This was a great additive to the game and I enjoyed really well.
- The storyline is unique to the single player story line, but somewhat ties itself in
- Lots of puzzles
- Still alot of humor
- Utilizes teamwork perfectly
- You cannot do puzzles by yourself, you have to do them with a mate

Overall this game is amazing.
10/10 would play over and over
Definitly one of the greats

Portal 2 is a worthy sequel to one of the best games ever made and a must own for anyone who enjoyed the first game.

It faithfully builds on the original Portal but whereas that game was a smaller project this one has been given the full weight of an AAA studio behind it. As a result the graphics are noticeably better, the game is a much more complete package that easily quadruples the original in terms of content, it introduces new puzzle elements that fit well in the universe, continues the brilliant humour and dark, dry wit of the original, and perhaps most notably introduces two new characters that are almost as good as the original GLaDOS. In fact the Cave Johnson segments of Portal 2 are the best parts of this game.

With all of that said I think I still rank Portal slightly higher. It's not as pretty, nor is it as well-rounded and complete a game, but it was the first game to deliver line after line of exceptional dialogue and dark humour. The writing in both games is exceptional - easily the best I've ever experienced in all of gaming, and this makes both an absolute joy to discover for the first time - but Portal did it all first and deserves the credit for having done so even if Portal 2 is the better game.

Half Life 2 modu olan bir oyun açıkcası Half Life 2 grafikler aynı tek değişiklik oyun birazcık zeka ve dikkat oyunu çok rahat bitirebilir MP ve Tek oyunculuda hikayeyi takip ederseniz oyun çok güzel oluyor.

Like every valve game with single player this game isnt exception in very charming and exciting story. The story continues after first game but you dont need to play it. Everything is explained in dialoges. I love all games made in Source engine it has very good realistic features and it still looks awesome even in 2016. The game is made on logic puzzle which you must solve only with your portal gun and your brain using features in environment. From the easiest you can get to finall boss at the end where you must use every experiences what you had in game (for me final boss was easier then some puzzles throught the game). I didnt realised any cons on this game, cca 8 hours of campaing and after that very much hours of coop puzzzles which you can solve with your friend (and its really funny) as two funny cute robots, can give you many hours of fun
Very good game for any puzzle lover

Portal 2 é muito mais do que as gameplays em dupla que vemos, por incrivel que pareça também é muito divertido em seu modo single player,cada personagem (por mais que sejam poucos) tem suas caracteristicase sua carisma,positiva e negativa,o que faz o jogo ficar mais involvente para quem está jogando sozinho.

Já o modo multiplayer não tem muito o que falar, vc faz seus momentos engraçados, o que faz ser o melhor modo desse jogo.

[b] uma coisa que ninguem faz mas que é super recomendado nesse jogo é ver os extras, uma mais engraçada que a outra por mais que sejam curtas, deixam um gostinho de quero mais. (animação 10/10) [/b]

If you've not played Portal 2, you're missing out on one of the greatest gaming experiences of your life.  

I know.  Cave Johnson told me so.

ps:  This experience will be a bit more enhanced if you've played the first one previous to this although I don't suspect you'll be too disoriented by jumping into the sequel head on.

pps:  After you've survived the first player campaign, find a friend and tackle the multiplayer portion of the game.  Then drop them in a bottomless pit.  Oh sorry.  No.  I mean, work together to overcome challenging puzzles and then drop them in a bottomless pit.  Make sure to wave as they fall.

난이도 또한 MEL보다 한참 쉬워서.. 오히려 첫플레인데도 금방 깨지 않았나 싶다..ㅎㅎ

3? 3이 나올 수 있는 엔딩인지는 모르겠지만
뭐 나온다면 MEL처럼 1과 2 사이의 스토리나 1 이전 스토리로 넣어 속편을 만드는게 낫다고 생각한다 XD
